creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
portfolio: Quelques Aspects de la Vie de Paris (Some Scenes of Parisian Life), 1899
provenance: Ruth and Bruce Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1992.
text: One of Bonnard's favorite themes was the variety of pedestrian and vehicular traffic along the boulevard de Clichy, a busy thoroughfare near both his home and studio.
title: Boulevard
